General.Name: Mirza International Limited
General.Description: Mirza International Limited manufactures and exports leather footwear in India and internationally. The company offers formal, boots, and casual footwear products. It offers its products under Thomas Crick, Off The Hook London, and Oaktrak brands. The company sells its products through e-commerce platforms and online stores. Mirza International Limited was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Kanpur, India.
